nodes.text: Tinnin Droo was a Newcomer living on Nam Chorios as of 13 ABY where he owned a machine shop which included a smelter. He and his assistant, Nap Socker, were severely burned when Luke Skywalker, who had come to investigate the disappearance of Callista Ming, used the Force, accidentally causing a massive Force Storm that overturned the smelter.
